headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Goldman Sachs Group (GS) Entering Interbank Crypto Options Trading
summary: In the past week, DBS Bank and Goldman Sachs completed the first-ever over-the-counter cryptocurrency options trade between banks, involving cash-settled Bitcoin and Ether options structured for risk management purposes. This milestone is significant because it signals a new stage of integration between digital assets and traditional finance, potentially laying the groundwork for a formal interbank crypto options market. We'll explore how this entry into interbank crypto derivatives may...
